resp = client.search(
    index="test",
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "match": {
                        "content": "2016"
                    }
                }
            ],
            "should": [
                {
                    "rank_feature": {
                        "field": "pagerank"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "rank_feature": {
                        "field": "url_length",
                        "boost": 0.1
                    }
                },
                {
                    "rank_feature": {
                        "field": "topics.sports",
                        "boost": 0.4
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
